net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.exception.derby
Class DerbyExceptionInterpreter

java.lang.Object
  net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.exception.derby.DerbyExceptionInterpreter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExceptionInterpreter
public class DerbyExceptionInterpreter
extends Object
implements IExceptionInterpreter

Implementation for the derby database. (Currently using 10.3.2.1.) See http://publib.boulder.ibm.com/infocenter/cscv/v10r1/index.jsp?topic=/com.ibm.cloudscape.doc/rrefexcept71493.html

Since:
1.2.0

Method Detail

explain

public String explain(Throwable cause)
Description copied from interface: IExceptionInterpreter
Descend recursively the cause chain to find the first SQLException and explain it as if calling IExceptionInterpreter.explain(SQLException) for it.

Specified by:
explain in interface IExceptionInterpreter
Parameters:
cause - (required) an exception that is likely to be caused by a SQLException somewhere down the cause chain
Returns:
An explanation of the first SQLException or null if either there is no SQLException or no explanation is known for it
See Also:
Throwable.getCause()

explain

public String explain(SQLException cause)
Description copied from interface: IExceptionInterpreter
Return an explanation of what this error means and what the user should do about it. The explanation can be used in a log or as a message of a new, higher-level exception wrapping the original one.

Specified by:
explain in interface IExceptionInterpreter
Parameters:
cause - (required) the exception to explain
Returns:
An explanation or null if nothing special is known about this error
